string.name: About
string.p: eBook is an android app that helps students in learning.It gives students the required materials to use in school.It is also used by teachers to teach students with.
To many students who lack enough book materials, eBook is used as a wholesome facility to help them get the books they need.
Using eBook learners can also get material online and tutorials that they can use to sharpen their skills.
eBook can give learners quality reading material and keeps records of saved information.

string.name: html_link
string.p: Primary School books and learning equipment for all grades.

html.p: Campus students and college students can get learning material on specified units on different degree and diploma courses. Students are advised to check keenly on the courses that they take.
